featured.text: However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.
In an uncertain situation. (C) Under control by the authority.

In medieval Europe, on the other hand, travel documents were issued by local authorities, and generally contained a list of towns and cities which the document holder was permitted to enter or pass through.

definition.en_def: The power or right to give orders, make decisions, and enforce obedience.
definition.example: The teacher has the authority to assign homework.
